turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I looking to place an order at the Starbucks in on Market Street in the Philadelphia Marriott Downtown.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: looking for a venti caffè mocha with non-fat milk with whip cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, that was a venti caffe mocha with non fat milk and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me send your order to that starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti caffe mocha with non fat milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on market street in philadelphia, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
